data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3337913,"name":"","username":"gnubison","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/g/6bbea6/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-03-20T02:20:58.561Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eTeam 1778 has just purchased a new Limelight 3G, which will replace our current Limelight 3. As my co-programmer was reconfiguring the new camera, I was wondering if we could copy over the settings directly. Is there any way to export the state as a JSON file, or similar, and then restore from that file?\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eHaving the Limelight configuration in a file in our repository sounds a lot better than storing it in mutable, hidden filesystem state. It would also make it easier to replace our hardware if our limelight dies, and easier to keep settings in sync with the backup. Can we accomplish this?\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":4,"updated_at":"2024-03-20T02:20:58.561Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":56,"reads":58,"readers_count":57,"score":291.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":459385,"topic_slug":"saving-and-restoring-limelight-settings","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":61071,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"1778 Programmer"},"post_url":"/t/saving-and-restoring-limelight-settings/459385/1","custom_user_title":"1778 Programmer","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3337937,"name":"Kevin Hjelstrom","username":"KH987","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/kh987/{size}/182255_2.png","created_at":"2024-03-20T02:44:54.362Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eOn the top of the web dashboard to the right of the pipeline name, there are two buttons that allow you to download or upload pipelines.
